titleStmt.title: Thirteene sermons of Maister Iohn Caluine, entreating of the free election of God in Iacob, and of reprobation in Esau A treatise wherin euery Christian may see the excellent benefites of God towardes his children, and his maruelous iudgements towards the reprobate, firste published in the French toung, & now translated into English, by Iohn Fielde, for the comfort of all Christians.
Treze sermons de l'election gratuite de Dieu en Jacob et de la rejection en Esau. English
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.

titleStmt.title: Thirteene sermons of Maister Iohn Caluine, entreating of the free election of God in Iacob, and of reprobation in Esau A treatise wherin euery Christian may see the excellent benefites of God towardes his children, and his maruelous iudgements towards the reprobate, firste published in the French toung, & now translated into English, by Iohn Fielde, for the comfort of all Christians.
Treze sermons de l'election gratuite de Dieu en Jacob et de la rejection en Esau. English
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
Fielde, John, d. 1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Dawson] for Thomas Man and Tobie Cooke,
